Correction to: My path to primatology: some stories from the field
Linda Marie Fedigan1
Published online: 13 September 2022 © The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Japan Monkey Centre 2022
Correction to: Primates (2022) 63:313–325 https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s10329- 022- 00994-2
In the original publication of the article, Fig. 1 was published incorrectly. The correct Fig. 1 is given in this correction.
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s10329- 022- 00994-2.
* Linda Marie Fedigan fedigan@ucalgary.ca 1 Department of Anthropology and Archaeology, University of Calgary, Calgary, AB, Canada
Publisher's Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

title: Correction to: My path to primatology: some stories from the field
